1.title: Sturgis
1.plot: At the granddaddy of all biker rallies, the local sheriff's department contends with everything from drug traffickers to giant snapping turtles, while bikers indulge in beer belly contests, mobile saloons, extreme carnival sideshows and firing ranges.

imdb.plot outline: From legendary rides to custom bikes, from music and mayhem to swarms of leather, loud engines and tons of chrome, small towns are transformed into party central when thousands of motorcycle enthusiasts descend upon some of the most well-known biker rallies in the country
imdb.title: Badass Biker Rallies
plot: From legendary rides to custom bikes, from music and mayhem to swarms of leather, loud engines and tons of chrome, small towns are transformed into party central when thousands of motorcycle enthusiasts descend upon some of the most well-known biker rallies in the country
